comments.body: I'm not going to hold up the PR for this but it would be good if you could do a test without `name` at some point in the future.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +297,301 @@        - azure_vm.properties.availabilitySet.id

- name: Retrieve vms facts (filtering by name)
  azure_rm_virtualmachine_facts:
    resource_group: "{{ resource_group }}"
